verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH4150>, The set feasts of Jehovah<WH3068>, which ye shall proclaim<WH7121> to be holy<WH6944> convocations<WH4744>, even these are my set feasts<WH4150>.

Six <WH8337> days<WH3117> shall work<WH4399> be done<WH6213>: but on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is a sabbath<WH7676> of solemn rest<WH7677>, a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; ye shall do<WH6213> no manner of work<WH4399>: it is a sabbath<WH7676> unto Jehovah<WH3068> in all your dwellings<WH4186>.
These are the set feasts<WH4150> of Jehovah<WH3068>, even holy<WH6944> convocations<WH4744>, which ye shall proclaim<WH7121> in their appointed season<WH4150>.
In the first<WH7223> month<WH2320>, on the fourteenth<WH702> day of the month at even<WH6153>, is Jehovah<WH3068>'s passover<WH6453>.

And on the fifteenth<WH2568> day<WH3117> of the same month<WH2320> is the feast<WH2282> of unleavened bread<WH4682> unto Jehovah<WH3068>: seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> ye shall eat<WH398> unleavened bread<WH4682>.
In the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> ye shall have a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>: ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>.

But ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>: in the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>; ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH935>, When ye are come into the land<WH776> which I give<WH5414> unto you<WH7114>, and shall reap the harvest<WH7105> thereof<WH935>, then ye shall bring the sheaf<WH6016> of the first-fruits<WH7225> of your harvest<WH7105> unto the priest<WH3548>:
and he shall wave<WH5130> the sheaf<WH6016> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, to be accepted<WH7522> for you<WH4283>: on the morrow after the sabbath<WH7676> the priest<WH3548> shall wave it<WH5130>.

And in the day<WH3117> when ye wave<WH5130> the sheaf<WH6016>, ye shall offer<WH6213> a he-lamb<WH3532> without blemish<WH8549> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old for a burnt-offering<WH5930> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

And the meal-offering<WH4503> thereof shall be two<WH8147> tenth parts of an ephah<WH6241> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil<WH8081>, an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068> for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381>; and the drink-offering<WH5262> thereof shall be of wine<WH3196>, the fourth<WH7243> part of a hin<WH1969>.

And ye shall eat<WH398> neither bread<WH3899>, nor parched grain<WH7039>, nor fresh ears<WH3759>, until this selfsame<WH6106> day<WH3117>, until<WH5704> ye have brought<WH935> the oblation<WH7133> of your God<WH430>: it is a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755> in all your dwellings<WH4186>.

And ye shall count<WH5608> unto you from the morrow<WH4283> after the sabbath<WH7676>, from the day<WH3117> that ye brought<WH935> the sheaf<WH6016> of the wave-offering<WH8573>; seven<WH7651> sabbaths<WH7676> shall there be<WH1961> complete<WH8549>:

even unto<WH5704> the morrow<WH4283> after the seventh<WH7637> sabbath<WH7676> shall ye number<WH5608> fifty<WH2572> days<WH3117>; and ye shall offer<WH7126> a new<WH2319> meal-offering<WH4503> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

Ye shall bring out<WH935> of your habitations<WH4186> two<WH8147> wave<WH8573> - loaves<WH3899> of two<WH8147> tenth parts of an ephah<WH6241>: they shall be of fine flour<WH5560>, they shall be baken<WH644> with leaven<WH2557>, for first-fruits<WH1061> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

And ye shall present<WH7126> with the bread<WH3899> seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> without blemish<WH8549> a year<WH8141> old<WH259>, and one young<WH1241> bullock<WH6499>, and two<WH8147> rams<WH352>: they shall be a burnt-offering<WH5930> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, with their meal-offering<WH5930>, and their drink-offerings<WH5262>, even an offering<WH4503> made by fire<WH801>, of a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
And ye shall offer<WH6213> one<WH259> he-goat<WH5795> for a sin-offering<WH2403>, and two<WH8147> he-lambs<WH3532> a<WH1121> year<WH8141> old for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace-offerings<WH2077>.

And the priest<WH3548> shall wave<WH5130> them with the bread<WH3899> of the first-fruits<WH1061> for a wave-offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068>, with the two<WH8147> lambs<WH3532>: they shall be holy<WH6944> to Jehovah<WH3068> for the priest<WH3548>.

And ye shall make proclamation<WH7121> on the selfsame<WH6106> day<WH3117>; there shall be a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744> unto you<WH6213>; ye shall do no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>: it is a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> in all your dwellings<WH4186> throughout your generations<WH1755>.

And when ye reap<WH7114> the harvest<WH7105> of your land<WH776>, thou shalt not wholly<WH3615> reap<WH7114> the corners<WH6285> of thy field<WH7704>, neither shalt thou gather<WH3950> the gleaning<WH3951> of thy harvest<WH7105>: thou shalt leave<WH5800> them for the poor<WH6041>, and for the sojourner<WH1616>: I am Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, In the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>, on the first<WH259> day of the month<WH2320>, shall be a solemn rest<WH7677> unto you<WH2146>, a memorial of blowing<WH8643> of trumpets<WH6944>, a holy convocation<WH4744>.
Ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>; and ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Howbeit <WH389> on the tenth<WH6218> day of this seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> is the day<WH3117> of atonement<WH3725>: it shall be a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744> unto you<WH6031>, and ye shall afflict your souls<WH5315>; and ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

And ye shall do<WH6213> no manner of work<WH4399> in that same<WH6106> day<WH3117>; for it is a day<WH3117> of atonement<WH3725>, to make atonement<WH3725> for you before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
For whatsoever soul<WH5315> it be that shall not be afflicted<WH6031> in that same<WH6106> day<WH3117>; he shall be cut off<WH3772> from his people<WH5971>.
And whatsoever soul<WH5315> it be that doeth<WH6213> any manner of work<WH4399> in that same<WH6106> day<WH3117>, that soul<WH5315> will I destroy<WH6> from among<WH7130> his people<WH5971>.
Ye shall do<WH6213> no manner of work<WH4399>: it is a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755> in all your dwellings<WH4186>.

It shall be unto you a sabbath<WH7676> of solemn rest<WH7677>, and ye shall afflict<WH6031> your souls<WH5315>: in the ninth<WH8672> day of the month<WH2320> at even<WH6153>, from even<WH6153> unto even<WH6153>, shall ye keep<WH7673> your sabbath<WH7676>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, On the fifteenth<WH2568> day<WH3117> of this seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> is the feast<WH2282> of tabernacles<WH5521> for seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
On the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> shall be a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744>: ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>.

Seven <WH7651> days<WH3117> ye shall offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>: on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> shall be a holy<WH6944> convocation<WH4744> unto you<WH7126>; and ye shall offer an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>: it is a solemn assembly<WH6116>; ye shall do<WH6213> no servile<WH5656> work<WH4399>.

These are the set feasts<WH4150> of Jehovah<WH3068>, which ye shall proclaim<WH7121> to be holy<WH6944> convocations<WH4744>, to offer<WH7126> an offering made by fire<WH801> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, a burnt-offering<WH5930>, and a meal-offering<WH5930>, a sacrifice<WH2077>, and drink-offerings<WH5262>, each<WH1697> on its own<WH3117> day<WH3117>;

besides the sabbaths<WH7676> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and besides your gifts<WH4979>, and besides all your vows<WH5088>, and besides all your freewill-offerings<WH5071>, which ye give<WH5414> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.

Howbeit on the fifteenth<WH2568> day<WH3117> of the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>, when ye have gathered<WH622> in the fruits<WH8393> of the land<WH776>, ye shall keep<WH2287> the feast<WH2282> of Jehovah<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>: on the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> shall be a solemn rest<WH7677>, and on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> shall be a solemn rest<WH7677>.

And ye shall take<WH3947> you on the first<WH7223> day<WH3117> the fruit<WH6529> of goodly<WH1926> trees<WH6086>, branches<WH3709> of palm-trees<WH8558>, and boughs<WH6057> of thick<WH5687> trees<WH6086>, and willows<WH6155> of the brook<WH5158>; and ye shall rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>.

And ye shall keep<WH2287> it a feast<WH2282> unto Jehovah<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> in the year<WH8141>: it is a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755>; ye shall keep<WH2287> it in the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320>.
Ye shall dwell<WH3427> in booths<WH5521> seven<WH7651> days<WH3117>; all that are home-born<WH249> in Israel<WH3478> shall dwell<WH3427> in booths<WH5521>;

that your generations<WH1755> may know<WH3045> that I made the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> to dwell<WH3427> in booths<WH5521>, when I brought them out<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>: I am Jehovah<WH3068> your God<WH430>.
And Moses<WH4872> declared<WH1696> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> the set feasts<WH4150> of Jehovah<WH3068>.
